name: deepread-workspace
description: Workspace for DeepRead - A PDF reader application with AI chat capabilities

scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../bin && npm install
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev:electron: concurrently -n 'frontend,electron' -c 'yellow,blue' 'cd frontend && VITE_WATCH=true npm run dev' 'cd app && npx electron .'
scripts.build:electron: npm run build:frontend && cd app && npx electron-forge make
scripts.build:bin: npm run build:frontend && mkdir -p bin/frontend && cp -r frontend/dist/* bin/frontend/ && cd bin && npm version $npm_package_version && npm pack
